page.title: 15 A Modern School
page.content: In our school today there are many differences from the work they did in the past. For example in the past they had different schools for boys' and girls'.Today we have mixed schools so we can learn to get on with others,as now women are classed as highly as men. Schools now have tables and we are allowed to talk as it makes an atmosphere that's easier to work in. In the past children sat at desks in rows and weren't allowed to speak. Also today we use books and equipment which makes work more fun,whereas in the past the teacher used to write on a blackboard and the children would copy the work into their books. Today we also work outside from first hand experience.
